summary: Build bottom-up: utils → storage → engine → embeddings → tools → server
context: Need a clear build order that respects dependency layers.
rationale: Each layer only depends on layers below it. Storage never calls engine, engine never calls tools. This makes testing straightforward — each layer can be tested in isolation with mocks of the layer below.
override_reason: False-positive conflict detection — build order and coordination pattern are orthogonal. Restoring to active.
